projects.name: Interactive Map Visualiser
projects.description: The network performance leadership viewer is an interactive visualization system which shows various successful cases. The user can the filter to select the topic of the case. When selected the filter on the map and a popup window appears with a preview of the case. The visitor can read the full text of the case on a separate page.
